Explanation: The doctor did not suggest any investigations specifically targeting the heel area or similar to an X-ray of the right foot with the justification of ruling out fractures or bone abnormalities.
The doctor did not suggest an investigation similar to 'Ultrasound of the heel' for assessing soft tissue injuries.
The doctor did not suggest an MRI of the foot or any similar investigation that provides detailed images of both bone and soft tissue.
The doctor did not suggest any blood tests or similar investigations to rule out inflammatory or infectious causes of heel pain.
The doctor did not suggest a physical examination focusing specifically on the foot and ankle, which is necessary for assessing conditions like plantar fasciitis or Achilles tendonitis.
